Title: ShellNavigator
Description:
This tool will help you in common scenario:

"Well, I've found a file in explorer, I want to open solution which contains project which contains my file"

ShellNavigator will add some Windows Shell extensions and allow to open selected file in VisualStudio within proper solution.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This tool will help you in common scenario:

"Well, I've found a file in explorer, I want to open solution which contains project which contains my file"

ShellNavigator will add some Windows Shell extensions and allow to open selected file in VisualStudio within proper solution.
